title: Dead Talents Society
screenings: Hyde Park Screen One, Sat 9 Nov 18:45 & Sun 10 Nov 15:00 | Vue Screen 11, Wed 13 Nov 20:45
info: John Hsu | Taiwan | 2024 | 105 minutes | Min Nan, Mandarin Chinese with English subtitles
description: Being dead isn’t easy. Spirits must prove themselves worthy of becoming ghosts through a rigorous selection process of auditions and contests. A newly deceased young woman known as ‘’The Rookie’’ quickly learns that it’s a dog-eat-dog underworld.
